The video is titled: Agar Kisi Ko Allah Ki Zaat Par Waswasa – Whispers Aaye To Kya Kare By Adv. Faiz Syed” which translates to “What should one do when they get whispers (evil or negative thoughts) about the existence of Allah.”
The video does not advocate spitting on: but rather provides advice on dealing with negative thoughts about the existence of Allah.
